title: IU alum Catt Sadler to host Hoosier Hysteria
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest IU alum Catt Sadler to host Hoosier Hysteria BLOOMINGTON --Indiana will open the doors to Assembly Hall at 5 p.m., Oct. 24, for this year's iteration of Hoosier Hysteria. A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 1 To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs IU alum Catt Sadler to host Hoosier Hysteria Zach Osterman , zach.osterman@indystar.com 1:33 p.m. EDT October 14, 2015 Catt Sadler will emcee this year's Hoosier Hysteria. (Photo: AP) 1 CONNECT 6 TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
BLOOMINGTON -- Indiana will open the doors to Assembly Hall at 5 p.m., Oct. 24, for this year's iteration of Hoosier Hysteria . 
Details for the annual season tip-off event were confirmed in a press release Wednesday. E! News personality and IU alumna Catt Sadler will emcee this year's event, which begins with a shootaround attended by the IU women's basketball team. 
"I've never been more excited to return to Indiana," Sadler said in the release. "As a Hoosier and Indiana University graduate, coming home to take part in Hoosier Hysteria brings me an immense amount of joy as I know it is an absolute privilege to take part in this historic sporting occasion." 
The release does not include a more specific schedule of events, but it says Hoosier Hysteria "includes skits, skill contests, scrimmages and autographs." 
As usual, admission is free, but fans attending are encouraged to bring canned goods for Hoosier Hills Food Bank. 
Follow Star reporter Zach Osterman on Twitter: @ZachOsterman.
